# Lingering Flames (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]], [[6th Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 6]] (fire)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a pinch of sulfur and a length of copper wire)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius spread

**Duration:** 3 rounds

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Complete Mage (WotC), pg. 110

*A burst of flame erupts before you, raising the temperature of the area to scorching levels.*

This spell functions like *[[Fireball (Spell)|fireball]]*, except that the area remains filled with fire for the spell's entire duration. Any creature within or entering the area takes 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 15d6); a successful Reflex save halves this damage.
